entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 12.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
